channel.title: Help with a command
channel.description: Its not exactly a command, but i want to know, how do i make it so if someone wears a "pring" it resets the characters bank?

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

its in the first post, i said reset the characters bank… i tried resetbank(); cuz a void already exist of that so i tried it but it didnt work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

quick suggestion, what if u wear the ring?

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @conner1 conner_
item.description:
@conner1 wrote:

Darn, delta. Unfamiliar with that. I can’t help you… but someone should be able to! Sorry. Good luck-

The revision is the version of the cache that is being loaded. i.e., the latest revision of runescape is 627. The first RS2 revision was the 317. You are probably using a 474, 508, or 525 revision cache right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

whats a revision? and im using a delta base. I found out about if wearing perfect ring then something happens, but i dont now the line to make it reset a bank, i just know about Removallitems()

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @conner1 conner_
item.description:
@conner1 wrote:

There should be some method that handles when a player equips an item. Find that, then write an if statement that says If the item is a perfect ring, reset the bank. There is probably a method somewhere in your base that resets a bank. If not, post the revision and base you’re working on and someone will probably write it for you.

Read full topic
